        Returns:

      • writeToStream

        public int writeToStream(java.io.OutputStream destinationStream)
        Write the current state of this writer to a stream

        Note: In contrast to XmlStringWriter.toString() this works even if not all tags were properly closed.

        Parameters:
        destinationStream - the stream where the contents of this writer shall be written
        Returns:
        the number of bytes written to the stream
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the destinationStream is null
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this writer could not be closed or writing to the destinationStream failed

      • sanitizeForIdentifier

        public static java.lang.String sanitizeForIdentifier(java.lang.String input)
        Make an input string compliant to xsd:ID
        Parameters:
        input - the input string
        Returns:
        an xsd:ID compliant version of the input; never null
